home.name: Enqi Jing
home.title: Software Engineer
home.description: I am a self-motivated problem solver with a passion for addressing complex challenges and driving innovation through collaboration.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Introduction
about.description: I'm a software engineer with a passion for creating efficient, scalable systems that solve real-world problems. With expertise in Python, Java, React, and AWS, I specialize in developing robust back-end architectures and seamless front-end experiences. Whether it's building data-driven applications, optimizing systems for performance, or deploying production-ready solutions, I love turning ideas into tangible results.

fullstack.title: Full-Stack Development
fullstack.description: End-to-end web applications using Django (backend), React (frontend), and PostgreSQL (database).
features: RESTful API integration with Django REST Framework (DRF)

dataEngineering.title: Data Engineering & Automation
dataEngineering.description: Custom automated data pipelines and data visualization solutions using Python, PostgreSQL, and Tableau.

cloud.title: Cloud Deployment & Infrastructure
cloud.description: Scalable cloud solutions, system deployment, and server optimization using AWS, UWSGI, and Nginx.

ai.title: AI & ML Solutions
ai.description: Advanced artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions tailored to your business needs. Using Python and powerful ML libraries, I develop custom AI models and automation tools that help transform your data into actionable insights.
features: Custom AI model development (e.g., predictive models, classification)
Implementation of machine learning algorithms using Python and TensorFlow
Automated model training and tuning with Python
Data visualization and analysis using Tableau
Model deployment and management on cloud platforms (e.g., AWS)
